page.title: 03RECREATION IN GLENFIELD.
page.content: At home{children}watch television, play, or follow hobbies such as collections, models or computers. Sporting activities include BMX bikes, swimming, football, tennis, horse riding, judo, karate and badminton. Group activities include Cubs, Brownies, Scouts and Guides or dancing classes. The Scout band has won many prizes and is known nationally. There are 2 play parks. In 1985 there is to be a childrens summer play scheme.{Adult}clubs meet for football, bowls, art, cricket, archeology, bridge, gardening, country dancing & keep fit. There are 2 active Womens Institutes, a social club and 5 pubs. Senior citizens meet socially and for keep fit. Both local churches include activities for all. Local beauty spots are available for walking and sight seeing.
